div.p: Our Girls School provides gender specific, college prep driven education focusing on RULER, an evidence-based approach to social emotional learning that helps school communities integrate the teaching of emotional intelligence into daily life
Our Boys School provides gender specific, college prep driven education focusing on character development and an active approach to teaching to promote a sharp focus for problem solving
